title: Very nice

author: Stefan Trautvetter
comment: Being always on the lookout for speed reading tools, having found one that can run on my watch is a really neat little thing! Sadly, though, it suffers from the same problems that most other implementations do: 1. the same display duration for all words, independant of its length. I don't need to look at one letter words as long as at 10 letter words, so a dynamic setting like this is pretty crucial for me. An option for this would be awesome! 2. short breaks at punctuation characters, especially the end of sentences. This helps in understanding texts greatly in my opinion, so that would also be really nice to have. Basically, I think if it was possible to use the official Spritz sdk to display the text this app could be really great.

author: Tajanator
comment: I downloaded my Kindle ebook to my computer, had to reformat it since this app doesn't read MOBI or AZW...  Loaded it to my phone, uploaded it to the app, then imported it to my watch, and got a "Successfully Imported" popup on both phone & watch... But then i get a msg on the watch saying "oops there's no book here"...  nice. 👎

reply.author: Jacoh
reply.content: Sorry for your trouble with the app. Could you send an email to support@jacoh.com with a copy of the book and we can take a look? It may have been that when the book was converted, it resulted in 0 words.

title: Excellent

author: Chuck
comment: I really love this app but how do I remove a book from the watch (Moto 360) to read another one? I keep getting the same book. I tried deleting it from the app, but it's still on my watch and the new book won't show up. Getting Play Books can be tricky, since I can't find a way to remove DRM in Adobe, resulting in an Invalid File. Is worth sorting out, this is an amazing app!

reply.author: Jacoh
reply.content: Glad you like the app! Adobe Download Editions (ADE) should be able to import the DRM file. After you import the book into ADE, right-click on the file in ADE & open in finder,  The ePub should be there. Sorry you are having issues replacing books. Not enough room to troubleshoot here, but email support@jacoh.com and we can figure out what's wrong!

title: How to Remove Book?
